description: Group project involving designing a health psychology initiative, pitching ideas (week 3), presenting a 10-minute group presentation (week 8), and submitting an individual 2000-word report (week 10). Includes application of course concepts to community health improvement.
50-minute individual test in week 5 assessing understanding of weeks 1-4 content through multiple choice and short answer questions. Covers lectures, readings, and tutorials.

2-hour individual examination during university exam period assessing full course content through multiple choice and short answer questions. Tests understanding of health psychology principles and their application.
